definitions: any of a number of large sporting fish, many of which are edible.
shortDefinitions: several large sporting fish, many of which are edible

definitions: a fish of the jack family (Carangidae), including the yellowtail kingfish (Seriola grandis) of the South Pacific.
shortDefinitions: fish of jack family (Carangidae), including yellowtail kingfish (Seriola grandis) of South Pacific

definitions: a fish of the drum family (Menticirrhus saxatilis, family Sciaenidae), of the east coast of North America.
shortDefinitions: fish of drum family (Menticirrhus saxatilis, family Sciaenidae), of east coast of North America

definitions: a western Atlantic fish of the mackerel family (Scomberomorus cavalla, family Scombridae).
shortDefinitions: western Atlantic fish of mackerel family

definitions: a person regarded as an authority figure; an influential leader or boss.
